channel.title: Dart on Bob 學習筆記
channel.description: Recent content in Dart on Bob 學習筆記

item.title: Dart 101 入門筆記
item.description: 無腦玩了一下 Flutter， 後來還是覺得要看一下 Dart 語言基本用法， 這篇單純紀錄一下，最近會補完自己覺得該備忘的範例 Dart Object-oriented & Strongly Typed Syntax is like a mixture Javascript, Java, C# Install brew tap dart-lang/dart brew install dart Data Types Numbers Integer Double Strings Booleans Lists Maps Variables const - 常數，賦值後不可變更，必須明確賦值 final - 常數，賦值後不可變更，可以是運算後過的結果 var firstname = "Bob"; var year = 1989; String lastName = "Lu"; const bar = 1000000; final String name = 'Bob'; var dummy = const ['Hello']; dummy.
